name: You're Bad
description:
This is my first game. It's bad. But you're worse.

Prove me wrong.

Please put any feedback in the comments below - I would love to hear what you think!

It is two levels (maybe more in the future) and made following the brilliant Brackeys tutorial for Unity in one day.

If you want a Mac or Linux build let me know - it's just I have slow internet so haven't downloaded the stuff required for it yet. But seriously - you want to play this?
